```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(masspol)
library(mapview)
```

## State rep map

```{r}
districts <- ma_districts %>%
  full_join(ma_reps, by = c("NAME" = "District"))

mapview(districts, zcol = "Party", alpha.regions = 0.1, 
        col.regions = c("gray", "blue", "gray", "red", "yellow"))

```
